price: Şüphesiz rızık veren, güç ve kuvvet sahibi olan ancak Allah’tır.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
